response.skills: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Liderazgo de equipos, Negociación, Ingeniería, Desarrollo de productos, Servicio de atención al cliente

profile_positions.description: Mantenimiento de sistemas de refrigeración (aire acondicionado-chillers), mantenimiento de sistemas mecánicos (bombas, ventiladores, sistemas de trasmisión y motores eléctricos), seguimiento y control de las labores de mantenimiento, manejo de personal, seguimiento y cumplimiento de indicadores de gestión y sistema de gestión de calidad. Supervisión de montajes, modificación de maquinaria, proyectos y manejo de contratistas. Manejo de presupuestos y proveedores.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero Mecánico de Mantenimiento

profile_positions.description: Mantenimiento de sistemas mecánicos (bandas transportadoras, elevadores, bombas, calderas, generadores diesel), manejo de personal, creación e implementación de programas de mantenimiento, seguimiento y cumplimiento de indicadores de gestión. Supervisión de montajes y manejo de contratistas.
profile_positions.title: Pasante Mantenimiento General

company.name: Decowraps
company.description:
Since 1999, Decowraps’ objective has been to supply the floral industry with the most innovative packaging products, focusing mainly on modern retail organizations and their suppliers worldwide.
 
At Decowraps, our goal is to enhance special moments for the end consumer by offering our customers solutions to make their business more successful. As a result of global sourcing, vertical integration and superior, personalized customer service, we have built a reputation as a leading supplier of distinctive packaging options for all levels of fresh cut flowers and potted plants.  
 
Our proven process has allowed us to assure our customers that we stand behind our work, and if any issues should arise, we will address them on our dime.

Thanks to our sales and warehouse facilities in Aalsmeer, Bogota, Miami, Mississauga, California, Nevada, Quito and Kenya, we are able to offer prompt service, simplified logistics and competitive pricing. 

Since its creation in 2010, Accents by Decowraps has also been focused on offering customized, exclusive and unique solutions for upgrades in fresh cut flowers and potted plants. This includes: picks, glass vases and ceramics, along with biodegradable, zinc, plastic and woven containers.
